original_text: Then Zedekiah the son of Chenaanah came near, and smote Micaiah upon the cheek, and said, Which way went the Spirit of the Lord from me to speak unto thee?
korean_text: 그나아나의 아들 시드기야가 가까이 와서 미가야의 뺨을 치며 이르되 여호와의 영이 나를 떠나 어디로 가서 네게 말씀하더냐 하는지라

sentences.original_text: Then Zedekiah the son of Chenaanah came near
and smote Micaiah upon the cheek
Which way went the Spirit of the Lord
from me to speak unto thee?
